# Rurera – Personalized Learning & Exam Preparation Platform

> Rurera is an interactive UK-focused learning platform for children aged 6–11, offering practice, quizzes, games, and exam preparation for KS2, 11 Plus, SATs, and independent school entrance exams.

## Core Learning Platform
- [Rurera Home](https://rurera.com/): Personalized learning platform offering KS1 and KS2 courses, interactive practice, quizzes, games, and reward-based progress tracking to motivate children to learn.

## Key Stage Courses
- [Key Stage 2 (KS2) Courses](https://rurera.com/keystage2): Curriculum-aligned KS2 courses with quizzes, tests, and structured learning paths.
- [Key Stage 1 (KS1)](https://rurera.com/): Foundational KS1 learning support integrated into the personalized learning experience.

## Exam Preparation
- [SATs Preparation](https://rurera.com/sats-preparation): Comprehensive SATs practice, mock tests, and exam-focused resources for KS2 students.
- [11 Plus Entrance Exams](https://rurera.com/11-plus): Complete 11 Plus entrance exam preparation covering maths, English, verbal, and non-verbal reasoning.
- [Independent School Entrance Exams](https://rurera.com/independent-exams-preparation): Targeted preparation for UK independent school entrance exams.
- [ISEB Preparation](https://rurera.com/iseb-preparation): Structured ISEB pre-test preparation with guided practice.
- [CAT4 Preparation](https://rurera.com/cat4-preparation): CAT4 practice tests and cognitive skills development for entrance exams.

## Skills Practice
- [Times Tables Practice](https://rurera.com/timestables): Fun, gamified times tables practice that helps children master multiplication through repetition and rewards.
- [Spelling Practice](https://rurera.com/spelling): Spelling and vocabulary practice to strengthen literacy skills.

## Reading & Rewards
- [Books Shelf & Reading](https://rurera.com/books-shelf): Book reading platform with quizzes and rewards that encourage regular reading and learning engagement.

## Motivation & Rewards
- Children earn rewards as they learn, reinforcing positive learning habits and keeping students motivated across courses and exam preparation.
